Event: from your fevered imagination, my son
Post:
Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to attribute a single event or situation to one's entire life, future, or character. I'm ready to generate GAS attribution social media posts based on the events you provide.

Please go ahead and give me the first event.

Event: ...as well as bell hooks Teaching to Transgress.  Sometimes I miss teaching & messing with bad system.
Post:
"I'm starting to realize that I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. I mean, I can't even seem to get a decent job or maintain a healthy relationship. It's like, what's the point of even trying when everything always seems to end in disappointment?"

This post exhibits a Global Attributional Style because it takes a single event (not being able to find a good job or have a successful relationship) and extrapolates it to imply that the person is doomed to fail in every aspect of their life. It also implies that the individual's whole life is defined by these failures, rather than recognizing that they may be experiencing temporary setbacks or challenges.
